services.title: Refugee Claims and Appeals
services.description: Complete representation at the Immigration Refugee Board, Refugee Appeal Division, and Federal Court of Canada, Including:
features: Federal Court of Canada applications and motions

services.title: Other Immigration Services
services.description: We may be able to assist you with following:
features: Family unification applications for permanent residence

additionalInfo.title: Need Help with Something Else?
additionalInfo.description: We can also assist you with other immigration matters. If we are not able to help you, we can refer you to lawyers who can.
